issue.body: Puzzle `119-34e4f180` in `src/test/java/com/jcabi/github/RtDeployKeysITCase.java:40-43` has to be resolved: RtDeployKeys should be able to fetch a list of deploy keys from a real Github repository, a single deploy key, create, edit and remove deploy keys. When done, remove this puzzle and Ignore annotation from the method.
